sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - உயர்த்துதல், பாதுகாப்பு, வலிமை, சுகமாயிரு, உபர், உயர்ந்தவர், அரணிப்பாயிரு, உயர்ந்திரு, உயர்த்து, உபரமுமாயிரு
to be high, to be inaccessibly high
2) to be set on high, to be (safely) set on high
1) to set on high, to set (securely) on high
2) to exalt, to exalt (in effective hostility)
d) (Pual) to be set (securely) on high
e) (Hiphil) to act in an exalting manner

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to be (causatively make) lofty, especially inaccessible; by implication safe, strong; used literally and figuratively: - defend, exalt, be excellent, (be, set on) high, lofty, be safe, set up (on high), be too strong.
Cognate: H4869, H7682, H7687
